### From Beans to Brews: Exploring the Third Wave of Coffee

An engaging and flavorful journey through the history and evolution of coffee, focusing particularly on the Third Wave movement. Dsicover how specialty coffee emphasizes quality, sustainability, and transparency, from sourcing to brewing. Explore different coffee processing methods, and learn how these methods impact flavour profiles. Dive into the artistry behind coffee packaging and uncover modern trends in specialty coffee. Whether you're a seasoned coffee enthusiast or just curious to learn more, this workshop promises a rich blend of education and sensory delight.
